summary: This is an email chain from April 26, 2019, discussing the preparation of a briefing and update memo for a meeting with an unnamed individual (potentially a political or legal figure) regarding the Epstein matter. The meeting's stated purpose is to discuss victim rights issues in Florida and to establish a connection.

events.title: Email discussion for Epstein briefing
events.description: Email correspondence arranging for the preparation of an update memo and talking points for a meeting about the Epstein case, specifically regarding victim rights issues in Florida.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated April 26, 2019, concerning the Epstein case.
The purpose is to prepare a briefing for a meeting with an individual interested in victim rights issues related to the Epstein case in Florida.
The tone is described as friendly, with an aim to establish a professional relationship.
All personal names and email addresses are redacted, indicated by placeholders like (USANYS).
